title: Hollywood Slaps
description: Hollywood Henn returns for an Oscars segment before the fellas discuss Biden's many foreign policy gaffes. Grover Norquist joins the progrum for an interview.
author: hello@ruthlesspodcast.com (Comfortably Smug, Amanda Henneberg, Josh Holmes, Michael Duncan, John Ashbrook, Grover Norquist)
